entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING, Peterborough
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:24 a.m. EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Showers at times heavy. High 13.
entry.summary: Showers at times heavy with risk of a thunderstorm. Local amount 30 to 40 mm. High 13. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:39 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Showers. Low 7.
entry.summary: Showers ending before morning then cloudy. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening. Local amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind north 20 km/h becoming southwest 20 late this evening. Low 7. Forecast issued 11:39 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
